1.content: A shinx is walking through the forest untill he bumped into...
1.title: A unexpected meeting.

13.content:
he bumped into a 10 ft tall yellow umbreon.
The 10 ft tall yellow umbreon started to grow.
The 10 ft tall yellow umbreon stops at 100 feet tall. then to 300 feet tall, then to 3 mile tall, then to 5 mile tall, then to 5000 mile tall, and then to 7000 mile tall.
The yellow umbreon stopped growing at...
13.title: A 10 ft tall yellow umbreon.

135.content:
And then he started to grow till he is 92,000 mile tall.
after that he walked towards...
135.title: 92,000 mile tall

1351.content: Bill went to town. The buildings did not reach the toes. Then it began to grow and grow ...
1351.title: the town

13513.content:
Bill went to town. The buildings did not reach the toes. Then he began to grow and grow to 200,000 mile tall.
Now he heard footsteps which becomes louder and louder.
Then he saw his pal Mick is a fat blue furred red ringed umbreon.
He looked up at him because Mick is a fat blue furred red ringed umbreon is
13513.title: 200,000 miles

info.brief_description: Bill and Mick are the diffirent coloured umbreons.
info.description:
Bill is a huge yellow furred umbreon.
His friend Mick is a fat blue furred red ringed umbreon.
Bill and Mick can't fly.
Other male pokemon can join.
No female pokemon are allowed only male.
info.pretty_title: Bill the giant yellow furred umbreon
